actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution affirming the importance of exercise and physical activity as key components of a healthy lifestyle, including in combating obesity, reducing chronic disease, and lowering health care costs.

summary.text: Affirms the importance of exercise and physical activity as key components of a healthy lifestyle, including combating obesity, reducing chronic disease, and lowering health care costs.Encourages the development of incentives to promote exercise and a more physically active and healthy United States.

titles.title: A resolution affirming the importance of exercise and physical activity as key components of a healthy lifestyle, including in combating obesity, reducing chronic disease, and lowering health care costs.
